title: What Is Jeopardy?
teaser: Because you've been programmed to give answers in the form of a question, all the answers in this game are famous phrases that begin with the question "what is."
contentencoded:
Because you've been programmed to give answers in the form of a question, all the answers in this game are famous phrases that begin with the question "what is."

Heard in Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
